content: Bimetal jig saw blades for metal Bimetal jig saw blades for cutting 2.5-6 mm thick (1/8 - 1/4) metal sheet and profiles ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Get more done with one blade – bimetal jig saw blades stay sharp for longer and better resist breakage Fewer blade changes – progressively increasing tooth pitch so you can cut a wide range of common metal thicknesses with the same blade Applications Straight cutting of ferrous and non-ferrous metal pipes, profiles and sheet (including steel) For use with all jig saws with a T-shank blade clamp ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Base material: Carbon steel, Unalloyed steel, Metal Plate, Sandwich panel Blade features: Precise cut, Straight cut, Long life Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Base material | Carbon steel, Unalloyed steel, Metal Plate, Sandwich panel | Blade features | Precise cut, Straight cut, Long life | Blade material | BIM Bi-Metal | Teeth per inch | 13 | Tooth type | Milled, Side set | Shank | Single lug shank (T-shank) | Tooth pitch | 2 mm | Toothed section length | 6.1 in | Blade length | 7 in ### ITEMS- 2332320 - Jig saw blade SP 155 (5) medium metal - Package Size 5 pc
